7 import threading
8 
9 import sys
10 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init
11 
12 # Commanders
13 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.arm_commander import ArmCommander
14 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.arm_state import ArmState
15 import moveit_commander
16 
17 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.command_enums import RobotCommanderException, ArmCommanderException

19 # Command Status
20 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus

22 # Messages
23 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatus
24 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
25 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import ArmMoveCommand
26 from moveit_msgs.msg import RobotTrajectory
27 from sensor_msgs.msg import JointState
28

30 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger, GetBool
31 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.srv import ComputeTrajectory
32 
33 # Action msgs
34 from niryo_robot_arm_commander.msg import PausePlanExecution, RobotMoveAction, RobotMoveResult

36 
37 class RobotCommanderNode:
38  """
39  This class is in charge of the Arm Commander Node
40  It contains:
41  - The State Publisher
42  - Arm & Tools Commanders
43 
44  Its main goal is to interpret command, and launch execution according to this command
45  """
46 
47  def __init__(self):
48  rospy.logdebug("Arm Commander - Entering in Init")
49  # Initialize MoveIt!
50  moveit_commander.roscpp_initialize(sys.argv)
51  # - Load all the sub-commanders
52 
53  # Initialize Arm
54  self.__arm_state = ArmState()
55  self.__arm_commander = ArmCommander(self.__arm_state)
56 
57  rospy.logdebug("Arm Commander - Sub Commanders are loaded")
58 
59  # Dict which link MoveCommand to arm functions
60  self.dict_interpreter_move_cmd = {
61  # Move to One Pose
62  ArmMoveCommand.JOINTS: self.__arm_commander.set_joint_target,
63  ArmMoveCommand.POSE: self.__arm_commander.set_pose_target_from_cmd,
64  ArmMoveCommand.POSITION: self.__arm_commander.set_position_target,
65  ArmMoveCommand.RPY: self.__arm_commander.set_rpy_target,
66  ArmMoveCommand.POSE_QUAT: self.__arm_commander.set_pose_quat_target,
67  ArmMoveCommand.LINEAR_POSE: self.__arm_commander.set_linear_trajectory,
68  ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_POSE: self.__arm_commander.set_shift_pose_target,
69  ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_LINEAR_POSE: self.__arm_commander.set_shift_linear_pose_target,
70 
71  # Trajectory
72  ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_TRAJ: self.__arm_commander.compute_and_execute_waypointed_trajectory,
73  ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_RAW_TRAJ: self.__arm_commander.execute_raw_waypointed_trajectory,
74  ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_FULL_TRAJ: self.__arm_commander.execute_waypointed_trajectory,
75 
76  # Add-Ons
77  ArmMoveCommand.DRAW_SPIRAL: self.__arm_commander.draw_spiral_trajectory,
78  ArmMoveCommand.DRAW_CIRCLE: self.__arm_commander.draw_circle_trajectory,
79  }
80 
81  # - Subscribers
82  self.__learning_mode_on = True
83  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/state', Bool, self.__callback_learning_mode)
84 
85  self.__pause_state = PausePlanExecution.STANDBY
86  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_rpi/pause_state', PausePlanExecution, self.__callback_pause_movement)
87 
88  # Event which allows to timeout if pause take too long
89  self.__pause_finished_event = threading.Event()
90  self.__pause_finished_event.set()
91  self.__pause_timeout = PausePlanExecution.PAUSE_TIMEOUT
92  self.__command_still_active_max_tries = rospy.get_param("~command_still_active_max_tries")
93  active_publish_rate_sec = rospy.get_param("~active_publish_rate_sec")
94 
95  rospy.logdebug("RobotCommanderNode.init - pause_timeout: %s", self.__pause_timeout)
96  rospy.logdebug("RobotCommanderNode.init - command_still_active_max_tries: %s",
97  self.__command_still_active_max_tries)
98  rospy.logdebug("RobotCommanderNode.init - active_publish_rate_sec: %s", active_publish_rate_sec)
99 
100  # - Services
101  rospy.Service('~stop_command', Trigger, self.__callback_stop_command)
102  rospy.Service('~is_active', GetBool, self.__callback_is_active)
103  rospy.Service('~compute_waypointed_trajectory', ComputeTrajectory, self.__callback_compute_trajectory)
104 
105  # Robot Action Server
106  self.__current_goal_handle = actionlib.ServerGoalHandle()
107  self.__action_server = actionlib.ActionServer('~robot_action',
108  RobotMoveAction,
109  goal_cb=self.__callback_goal,
110  cancel_cb=self.__callback_cancel,
111  auto_start=False)
112  self.__action_server_thread = threading.Thread()
113  self.__action_server_lock = threading.Lock()
114  # Starting Action server
115  self.__start_action_server()
116 
117  rospy.logdebug("Arm Commander - Services & Actions server are created")
118 
119  # - Publisher
120  self.__is_active_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~is_active', Bool, queue_size=5)
121  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(active_publish_rate_sec), self.__publish_is_active)
122 
123  # Wait for joint_states to be published
124  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
125  try:
126  rospy.wait_for_message('/joint_states', JointState, timeout=5.0)
127  break
128  except rospy.ROSException:
129  rospy.logwarn_once(
130  "Arm Commander - Topic /joint_states not available yet. Retrying..."
131  )
132 
133  # Set a bool to mention this node is initialized
134  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
135  rospy.loginfo("Arm Commander - Started")
136 
137  def __start_action_server(self):
138  self.__action_server.start()
139  rospy.logdebug("Arm Commander - Action Server started")
140 
141  # -- CALLBACKS
142  # - Subscribers
143  def __publish_is_active(self, *_):
144  msg = Bool()
145  msg.data = self.__current_goal_is_active()
146  try:
147  self.__is_active_publisher.publish(msg)
148  except rospy.ROSException:
149  return
150 
151  # - Subscribers
152  def __callback_learning_mode(self, msg):
153  activate = msg.data
154  if not self.__learning_mode_on and activate:
155  self.__arm_commander.trajectories_executor.stop_arm()
156  self.__learning_mode_on = activate
157 
158  # - Services
159  def __callback_stop_command(self, _):
160  self.__cancel_command()
161  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Command stopped"
162 
163  def __callback_is_active(self, _):
164  return self.__current_goal_is_active()
165 
166  def __callback_pause_movement(self, msg):
167  self.__pause_state = msg.state
168  if msg.state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
169  rospy.loginfo("Arm Commander - Receive Set Pause Mode from button")
170  self.__pause_finished_event.clear()
171  self.__cancel_command()
172  elif msg.state == PausePlanExecution.CANCEL:
173  rospy.loginfo("Arm Commander - Receive Cancel Command from button")
174  self.__pause_finished_event.set()
175  self.__cancel_command()
176  elif msg.state == PausePlanExecution.RESUME:
177  self.__pause_finished_event.set()
178 
179  def __callback_compute_trajectory(self, req):
180  try:
181  status, message, plan = self.__arm_commander.compute_waypointed_trajectory(req)
182  except ArmCommanderException as e:
183  return e.status, e.message, None
184 
185  return status, message, RobotTrajectory() if plan is None else plan.joint_trajectory
186 
187  # - Action Server
188  def __callback_goal(self, goal_handle):
189  """
190  This function verifies that all conditions are met in order to execute the request
191  :param goal_handle: object use to communicate with the action server
192  :return: None
193  """
194  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Received goal. Check if can be executed")
195 
196  # Check if motor connection problem
197  if not self.__arm_state.hardware_status.connection_up:
198  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.HARDWARE_NOT_OK,
199  "Motor connection problem, you can't send a command now")
200  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
201  return
202 
203  # Check if calibration is needed
204  if self.__arm_state.hardware_status.calibration_needed:
205  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.CALIBRATION_NOT_DONE,
206  "You need to calibrate the robot before sending a command")
207  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
208  return
209 
210  # Check if calibration is in progress
211  if self.__arm_state.hardware_status.calibration_in_progress:
212  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.CALIBRATION_NOT_DONE,
213  "Calibration in progress, wait until it ends to send a command")
214  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
215  return
216 
217  # Check if jog controller enabled
218  if self.__arm_commander.jog_controller.is_enabled():
219  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.JOG_CONTROLLER_ENABLED,
220  "You need to deactivate jog controller to execute a new command")
221  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
222  return
223 
224  # check if still have a goal
225  if self.__current_goal_is_active():
226  # If still have a goal, wait a bit to be sure it's not goal is still active
227  # due to concurrency issue
228  for i in range(self.__command_still_active_max_tries):
229  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - Current goal seems to be still active, "
230  "will retry {} time(s)".format(self.__command_still_active_max_tries - i))
231  rospy.sleep(0.2)
232  if not self.__current_goal_is_active():
233  break
234  else:
235  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.GOAL_STILL_ACTIVE, "Current command is still active")
236  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
237  return
238 
239  # Check if learning mode ON
240  if self.__learning_mode_on:
241  if not self.__arm_state.set_learning_mode(False):
242  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.LEARNING_MODE_ON, "Learning mode could not be deactivated")
243  goal_handle.set_rejected(result)
244  return
245 
246  # set accepted
247  self.__current_goal_handle = goal_handle
248  self.__current_goal_handle.set_accepted()
249  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Goal has been accepted")
250 
251  # Launch compute + execution in a new thread
252  self.__action_server_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.__execute_goal_action,
253  name="worker_execute_goal_action")
254  self.__action_server_thread.start()
255  rospy.logdebug("Commander Action Serv - Executing command in a new thread")
256 
257  def __callback_cancel(self, goal_handle):
258  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Received cancel command")
259 
260  if goal_handle == self.__current_goal_handle:
261  self.__cancel_current_command()
262  else:
263  rospy.logdebug("Commander Action Serv - No current goal, nothing to do")
264 
265  # -- EXECUTORS
266  def __reset_pause_play_state(self):
267  self.__pause_finished_event.set()
268  self.__pause_state = PausePlanExecution.STANDBY
269 
270  def __current_goal_is_active(self):
271  if not self.__current_goal_handle.goal:
272  return False
273  return self.__current_goal_handle.get_goal_status().status in [GoalStatus.ACTIVE, GoalStatus.PENDING]
274 
275  def __cancel_due_to_pause(self):
276  # Check if plan is paused
277  if not self.__pause_finished_event.wait(timeout=self.__pause_timeout):
278  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.PAUSE_TIMEOUT,
279  "Goal has been paused since too long, cancelling it")
280  self.__current_goal_handle.set_canceled(result=result)
281 
282  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - {}".format(result.message))
283  return True
284 
285  if self.__pause_state == PausePlanExecution.CANCEL:
286  result = self.create_result(CommandStatus.CANCEL_PAUSE, "Paused as been canceled")
287  self.__current_goal_handle.set_canceled(result)
288  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Goal has been successfully canceled")
289  return True
290 
291  return False
292 
293  def __execute_goal_action(self):
294  """
295  Threaded function which interpret and execute the command
296  It waits until the action finished and set goal_handle according to the result
297  :return: None
298  """
299  if self.__pause_state == PausePlanExecution.PAUSE:
300  while not self.__pause_finished_event.wait(1):
301  pass
302  self.__pause_finished_event.clear()
303  if self.__pause_state == PausePlanExecution.RESUME:
304  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Resuming goal action")
305  return self.__execute_goal_action()
306 
307  try:
308  cmd = self.__current_goal_handle.goal.goal.cmd
309 
310  (status, message) = self.__interpret_and_execute_command(cmd)
311  response = self.create_result(status, message)
312  result = response
313  except (RobotCommanderException, ArmCommanderException) as e:
314  result = self.create_result(e.status, e.message)
315  response = None
316  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - An exception was "
317  "thrown during command execution : {}".format(e.message))
318 
319  # Check response
320  if not response:
321  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(result)
322  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - Execution has been aborted")
323  elif response.status == CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
324  self.__current_goal_handle.set_succeeded(result)
325  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Goal has been set as succeeded")
326  elif response.status == CommandStatus.STOPPED:
327  self.__current_goal_handle.set_canceled(result)
328  rospy.loginfo("Commander Action Serv - Goal has been successfully canceled")
329  elif response.status == CommandStatus.CONTROLLER_PROBLEMS:
330  self.__cancel_command()
331  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(result)
332  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - Controller failed during execution : " + "Goal has been aborted.\n" +
333  "This is due to either a collision, or a motor unable to follow a given command" +
334  " (overload, extreme positions, ...)")
335  else:
336  self.__current_goal_handle.set_aborted(result)
337  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - Unknown result, goal has been set as aborted")
338 
339  def __interpret_and_execute_command(self, cmd):
340  """
341  Take a Robot command, give it to Arm or Tools commander, and return the result
342  :param cmd: ArmMoveCommand (see niryo_robot_msgs)
343  :return: status, message
344  """
345  cmd_type = cmd.cmd_type
346  return self.dict_interpreter_move_cmd[cmd_type](cmd)
347 
348  def __cancel_command(self):
349  self.__arm_commander.trajectories_executor.cancel_goal() # Send a cancel signal to Moveit interface
350 
351  @staticmethod
352  def create_result(status, message):
353  """
354  Create a RobotMoveResult object which can be send to the Action Server
355  :param status:
356  :param message:
357  :return: RobotMoveResult object
358  """
359  result = RobotMoveResult()
360  result.status = status
361  result.message = message
362  return result
363 
364  def __cancel_current_command(self):
365  try:
366  self.__cancel_command()
367  except RobotCommanderException:
368  rospy.logwarn("Commander Action Serv - Could not cancel current command ")
369 
370  @staticmethod
371  def goal_to_cmd_type(goal_handle):
372  return goal_handle.goal.goal.cmd.cmd_type
373 
374 
375 if __name__ == '__main__':
376  sentry_init()
377 
378  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_arm_commander', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
379 
380  # change logger level according to node parameter
381  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
382  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
383  logger.setLevel(log_level)
384 
385  try:
386  node = RobotCommanderNode()
387  rospy.spin()
388  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
389  pass
